markdownRemark.excerpt: So it’s very simple. and let’s see how adding a new blog post is so easy that I can open my text editor, add a blog and push it using github push, and acctions…
markdownRemark.html:
So it’s very simple. and let’s see how adding a new blog post is so easy that I can open my text editor, add a blog and push it using github push, and acctions will kick in to update my blog.

Blog is static

Yeah, will need to learn md

frontmatter.title: Testing
